name: Mycelmania
description:
A one-week game project for these jams: Mushroom Jam - Week 278, 20 SECOND GAME JAM. Music "Sow in Tears" by Kirk Smith.

Mycelmania is a short turn-based game like Triple Triad with 2.5 dimensional cards for fungus lovers. At the moment, the game only offers a split-screen experience. A computer opponent will be added later.

Controls

Mouse - Drag and Drop

Right Click while holding a card - Examine

Esc - Back to Menu

The game is still under development but is still playable. Most cards have the same images as placeholders. I will change these later. Inventory is still under construction.

You can support me by donating so I can add other mushrooms a lot faster.

If you pay $5 USD or more you get access to the assets of my first five mushrooms:

Includes Morchella, Death Trumpet, Veiled Lady, Inky Cap and Bloody Tooth.
